com.automation.seletest.core.selenium.webAPI

Interface ActionsController<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    WebDriverActionsController

    public interface ActionsController<T>
    This interface is for all methods used by webdriver to interact with app UI
    Author:
    Giannis Papadakis(mailTo:gpapadakis84@gmail.com)
